text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Summer camp has officially kicked<n>off! Vodka surveys the
grand sights<n>and deeply breathes in the smell of<n>the
ocean.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, let's race! Whaddya say to a<n>two-furlong sprint on
the sand? Think<n>you can match my speed?

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text:
Hmph, who do you think I am? I'm<n>already G1 material! Do
you really<n>think you'd win against me?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Absolutely—with my brand-new<n>"explosive running"
technique! Watch<n>me, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Raaargh! Look at the way I launch off<n>the sand! Man, this
technique's so<n>cool! I'm right behind my opponent!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
W-wait a second. Why is the gap<n>getting bigger again?!
Crap, I can't<n>close it! G1s are seriously in a whole<n>
'nother league...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Daaammit! Why?! I could swear I had<n>way more power!

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text: Heh, looks like this is the best you<n>can do. ♪

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
This sucks! Nah, you better watch me.<n>By the time this camp
is over, I'm<n>gonna be the king of this beach...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Oh, crap, I'm doing it again. Trying to<n>prove how cool I am is
totally<n>backfiring on me!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Hm, what's up, Trainer? If you're<n>here to try and make me
feel better—
choice_data_list: Try not to kick the sand out from behind you.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Kicking the sand... Oh, you mean<n>my "explosive
running" technique?<n>But if I don't kick, then I can't get<n>
enough power...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Hang on! I think I got it! Sand isdifferent—if I keep kicking it, I'mactually gonna lose powerinstead. In that case, I should... Hm...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure there's a better way to run.<n>Mom was super fast
even on dirt, but<n>she was never flashy. I bet I can try<n>to
pull something like that off too.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I think I got it... Um, excuse me! Can<n>we run it back? Please?

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what the?! What's with your<n>speed?! You're like a
totally different<n>person now!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
This is it! I just needed to lower my<n>center of gravity and
drive my feet into<n>the ground!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
From now on, this technique'll be<n>called my "slashing
style"! I just need<n>to concentrate all my power into my<n>
feet and push forward! Raaargh!

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text: I... lost... to this complete amateur...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I did it! ...Hey, thanks for racing<n>against me! You're
seriously a tough<n>opponent.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Let's meet again... in the Twinkle<n>Series. With your skills,
I'm sure<n>you'll easily climb to the top.

text_block_list.name: Older Student
text_block_list.text: Vodka, you...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The end of summer camp rolls<n>around, and with it came the
summer<n>festival. After the festivities, I find<n>Vodka again.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Man, festivals are great. I sold tons,<n>too!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I ate a bit, but I was also super busy<n>serving up food. I was
helping out at<n>one of the yakisoba places.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Did ya know that I'm actually super<n>good at making
noodles? When I was<n>little, my pops's buddy let me help<n>
out at his street stall.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
But that's beside the point, isn't it?<n>Trainer, thanks for
helpin' me out<n>during summer camp.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
And as for the type of coolness that I<n>wanna aim for—I think
it finally clicked.<n>That beach race made me realize that<n>it's
okay to have both types.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I can borrow from both my<n>pops's coolness and my
mom's<n>strength.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
I'll be the coolest runner who never<n>loses! And when I win,
that's when<n>I'll drop my cool one-liners! That way,<n>I'll
never come off as a sore loser.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Of course, that's easier said than<n>done, but I got this!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I got this baseless confidence<n>from my pops. Oh,
speaking of which,<n>my mom told me a story about him.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
It was about his reckless confidence.<n>Back before they
started going out...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Pops confessed his love to Mom<n>during the summer
festival.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
At the time, Mom was a rising star<n>and busy as any racer
could ever be.<n>Pops, on the other hand, was your<n>
run-of-the-mill guy.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Do you wanna guess why my mom<n>agreed to date him?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Sorta, but not quite. Apparently, Pops<n>started saying all kinds
of stuff. Like<n>how he'd become famous, or how<n>he'd
make her the happiest person<n>alive.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: My mom thought it was funny howhe talked himself up that much.He pretty much got her to say yesthrough sheer grit.
choice_data_list: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, huh?
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree, huh?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I got my heart from my pops,<n>and my legs from my
mom.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
That's just who I am! And with both<n>of these strengths
combined, no<n>challenge is too great for me.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Because I've gotten a hell of a lot<n>stronger since meeting
you!
choice_data_list: Did you also overcome your weakness?
Did you also overcome your weakness?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Of course! I used to get all flustered<n>just hearin' love
stories, but now I'm<n>totally fine... I think...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Come to think of it... Mom said that<n>after she agreed to date
Pops, they<n>rode his motorcycle home together.)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
(Riding tandem, huh... What if I went<n>back to the dorm with
Trainer like<n>that?)

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Huh, you'll give me a ride? Hop on?<n>O-okay... Don't mind if
I do...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Wh-what? Grab onto your waist? I-if<n>you say so...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Bfgldskdf!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah, I-I'm totally fine. Th-this is<n>'cause, um...

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text:
Chocolate bananas! That's it! I ate<n>too many chocolate
bananas earlier!<n>Believe me, damn it!
